Hero.h1: Turn Your AI-Generated Prototype Into a Production-Grade Product
Hero.h2: Prototype fast. Ship right. VibeToLive.dev is the launch ramp for solopreneurs, indie hackers, and lean teams who are vibecoding with AI tools—only to hit the wall when it's time to harden, secure, scale, and actually ship.

Feature.h3: From AI Prototype to Production Reality
Feature.description1: AI coding assistants are fantastic for getting from zero to 'something that runs,'
Feature.description2: but the resulting code is often less secure, harder to maintain, and full of inconsistencies.
Feature.description3: We take your AI-written codebase and make it live in production—safely, reliably, and with a foundation you can grow on.

Pricing.description: Choose the service track that best fits your needs and timeline.

Testimonial.description1: See how we've helped teams turn their AI-generated prototypes into production-ready applications.
Testimonial.description3: We'd love to feature your success with VibeToLive.dev.

Faq.description: Common questions about our AI prototype to production services.

CTA.h2: Ready to Turn the Vibe Into a Live Product?
CTA.h3: Let's chat. Share your repo, tech stack, and target launch window. We'll recommend the right track and lock in your start date.

About.h2: We specialize in turning AI-generated prototypes into production-grade applications. Our team brings years of experience in software architecture, security, and DevOps to help you ship with confidence.
About.why_content: We understand the unique challenges of AI-generated code. While AI tools are great for rapid prototyping, production requires security hardening, scalability planning, and operational excellence. We bridge that gap with focused, practical solutions.
About.team_content: We don't rewrite everything. We remediate what's required to ship safely and reliably. Our structured approach follows cloud best practices and production readiness checklists to ensure your launch is smooth and sustainable.

Blog.title: Resources
Blog.description: Guides, insights, and best practices for turning AI prototypes into production applications

Service.intro: Your AI prototype deserves more than just a demo. At VibeToLive.dev, we transform AI-generated prototypes into secure, scalable, production-grade applications—ready for real users and revenue.
Service.service1_content: Full technical and security audit including code review, data validation, infrastructure optimization, and security patching.
Service.service2_content: Production deployment with Docker/Kubernetes, CI/CD, SSL, token management, and data encryption.
Service.service3_content: Load testing, API optimization, model serving, caching, cost optimization, and auto-scaling setup.
Service.service4_content: 24/7 monitoring, bug fixes, model retraining, and product enhancement cycles.
Service.tech_stack_content: React, Next.js, Node.js, FastAPI, LangChain, OpenAI, Hugging Face, AWS, Docker, Vercel, Sentry, LogRocket.
why_choose_content: Deep expertise in AI & full-stack deployment
Focused on indie hackers and lean startups
Fast turnaround — prototype to production in weeks
